title: WTB 19th Century Anson / Kelly / Comiskey etc
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: WTB 19th Century Anson / Kelly / Comiskey etc
posts.post_content: Looking mainly for low grade psa/sgc cards that present well and mainly wanting to stay with Anson, Kelly & Comiskey or perhaps some other better known players.  Looking for Old Judge and Allen Ginter primarily.
Just a recommendation if you can swing it. I think the best value for the money on Anson is a nice Old Judge cabinet.
Thanks @oldjudge !  I'm not sure I'm totally excited about the cabinet cards, but I may have to take a look.  I like the standard sized cards and tobacco sized cards best.
Can't go wrong with n162 either.  Great looking cards.  Good luck with your search.

this one is probably only miscut and not altered. ...
